ARABIC: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'If we had only had a Reminder from the previous peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If we had the account of earlier people with us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: “If only we had the Reminder which had been granted to the people of yore
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had we received guidance from the people living before us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “If we had some advice from the earlier generations,” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If we had a reminder as had the men of old,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Had we a reminder from those of yore,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If only we had had a Reminder from the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If we had but a reminder from the men of old
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If we had had with us a Book like that of the people of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Had we but an admonition as had the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Had we possessed a Reminder from our predecessors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If only we had had before us a Message from those of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If we had a reminder as had the men of old (before the coming of Prophet Muhammad SAW as a Messenger of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If only we had a reminder from the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Had we received advice from the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:168] ‘If we had but a reminder, a scripture, from the ancients, that is, from among the scriptures of past communities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If we had but a reminder from the men of old) if we had a messenger as the people of old had.
